ModMetaData.name: MH: Frames Reforged
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7xuCZqW.png[/img] [h1]Submod for Mechanical Humanlikes: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2974536022]Android Tiers Core[/url][/h1] Designed for Rimworld 1.4 Mod Version V1.1 Please consider rating this if you like it! It really helps out. [img]https://i.imgur.com/tE28cZ7.gif[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/Be8E2qJ.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table] *Make sure there are no existing jobs, hediffs, or frames and (as always) employ [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2921585989]Mid-saver Saver[/url] to remove in the safest way possible.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/6o9HyTD.png[/img] This mod reworks a few existing frames for engineering consistency, tweaks the tech tree and unlock points, and adds a variety of extras.
Also includes code to ensure that the carrying capacity improvements from framework upgrades are applied to weight limits for all purposes including caravans.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Wh5EspM.png[/img] [b]Altered Frames:[/b] - Hydraulic (fixed carrying capacity bonus due to limitations of hydraulic actuators) - Refined (increased pawn beauty and flat social impact buff from looking nice) - Mobility (fixed movement speed bonus, again due to actual actuator functioning)
[b]Added Frames:[/b] - Standard: - Noble Frame (more refined version of the Refined Frame with a focus on enhancing Nobility) - Industrial: - Alignment Frame (hauling frame ideal for trainable mechanical animals) - Advanced Alignment Frame (improved from above but spacer tech and much more expensive) - Advanced Hydraulic Frame (as above; same scope of improvements and tech/cost changes) - Military: - Thermal Pumped Frame (combat oriented upgrade to the Guardian Frame) - Martial Frame (combat durability enhanced upgrade to the Mobility Frame) - Multithermal Composite Frame (advanced hybrid of the Composite and Guardian Frames) - Martial Composite Frame (advanced hybrid of the Composite and Mobility Frames) - "Valiant" Multicomposite Frame (direct and expensive upgrade to the Composite Frame)
I am happy to add other unique frames if people want them.
[b]NEW FEATURE - SOS2 COMPATIBILITY:[/b] - Vacuum-safe frame upgrades of advanced frames: - Noble Vacuum Frame - Sanitary Vacuum Frame - Alignment Vacuum Frame - Hydraulic Vacuum Frame - Multithermal Vacuum Frame - Martial Vacuum Frame - "Valiant" Vacuum Frame
ALL Vacuum frames come with a range of additional stat effects for being vacuum-proof.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Qp8JBtZ.png[/img] [h1]Recommended:[/h1] [list] [*]Works best with MH: Industrial Automatons! [*]Works best with MH: MUFF Reforged! [*]See my Choice Collection [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3151500886]here[/url]! [/list]
[h1]Incompatibilities:[/h1] [list] [*]No known incompatibilities.* [/list]
[u]The following mods are special cases:[/u] *EdB Prepare Carefully eventually breaks all custom pawns; but that's their problem. *Combat Extended does their own compatibility patches; this is fine if they're patched for ATR.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/lQRf9dG.png[/img] [b]Can this be patched to work with -insert mod-?[/b] [i]If you make a patch, I'll happily add it in. I may make patches if they're easy, but I won't be doing any messy patches myself though.[/i]
[b]Will you add the other localisations for other languages?[/b] [i]As above, if you would like to provide a localisation, I'll happily add it in.[/i]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/UN80Om5.png[/img] [h1]Language Translations[/h1] [list] [*]Russian language translation provided by Tkhakiro [/list] All translations are provided by the community in a voluntary capacity - I don't do them myself. Translations are not guaranteed to be up-to-date or to have errors fixed promptly. [h3]Want to submit a translation to your own language?[/h3] Go to the GitHub (linked below) and submit a pull request.
